website_summaries.verdict: The low-top Vans Mono Canvas Old Skool is a modern update of Van's possibly most vendible line, the Old Skool. It features the timeless silhouette which flaunts sleek monochromatic colorways that garnered acclaim for its style and functionality. Loyal and casuals are charmed with its overall appeal and comfort, making the shoe a priority, especially for summer ensembles. As easy on the wallet a shoe can be, the Vans Mono Canvas Old Skool is packed with style and improvements tailored for today's men and women.
pros: The majority of buyers commented that the Vans Mono Canvas Old Skool is comfortable
Many purchasers advised that it looks best for casual outfits
A couple of color looks better than the pictures
The shoe is affordable, as praised by many
One customer mentioned that this low-top has a good grip while on a skateboard
A few expressed their satisfaction by saying that the shoe provides a great fit
Its style has received wide acclamation from buyers and lookers
Some have chosen the low- top Vans Mono Canvas Old Skool as a gift for kids or teenagers and got positive remarks
It is an excellent choice for a summer sneaker, as suggested by some buyers
A blogger stated that this sneaker is an excellent example of a couple shoe
One tester stated that this low-top is durable
cons: One customer advised that cleaning this sneaker is a challenge
A few purchasers warned that the color faded quickly than expected even after minimal use
The stiffness of the shoe resulted in a cut, which dissatisfied a couple of buyers

customer_reviews.title: Value for money!
customer_reviews.text: These are used for special occasions so perhaps 12 times a year. Therefore these shoes are still in excellent condition and just as comfortable as the day they were purchased. Price was excellent and these shoes are now over 3 years old.
customer_reviews.author: MBaby

customer_reviews.title: Don’t rely on the size chart provided
customer_reviews.text: The product might be fine. But the size chart they offer is wrong .we were looking for a 44 europe size which said was 10.5 when 10.5 arrived it said 45 European size which still was massive. Had to return
customer_reviews.author: YASMIN

customer_reviews.title: my poor sore feet.
customer_reviews.text: you need thick socks for these as they rip your ankles to shreds. once I brought thick socks, they are now really comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Nick B

customer_reviews.title: Gutted after months of waiting for 5's
customer_reviews.text: I'm heartbroken. Months I have had 5.5 in my basket waiting for 5 to come back in as all reviews state they come up big. These 5's are so small. I can't believe it. They looked small as I opened them. Now there's no 5.5 in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, not for the boring outfit
customer_reviews.text: The color of the picture, does not match the color in the description. Please search of google to have a clear ideia of what you might receive. Apart of that, the shoes are super comfortable and fits very well on a variety of outfits. Both perfect for man and woman.
customer_reviews.author: Gonçalves

customer_reviews.title: Fab and comfy, high quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the way I can order these without even having to place a foot on the floor or wear my old ones ! They arrived at my door next day and then I had to stand up.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbob999

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended, great quality and nice colour.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Vans as always, these are a lovely colour, great quality. The only trainers I wear these days. Fast delivery, great service.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great price and fast delivery, so my 13 year old daughter is very happy
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I wear vans regularly, these are a great fit and style plus they are leather.
customer_reviews.author: greenlotus1975

customer_reviews.title: Besides that great design and lovely to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought the same size as other trainers, but it's a little bit small. Besides that great design and lovely to use.
customer_reviews.author: Igo L.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Item as described. Nice rich red colour.
customer_reviews.author: jinty

customer_reviews.title: Size references needed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit came way too small please check size references and if they dont have one pls get one because my shoes cang get on my feet when ik I asked 4 a size 4.5
customer_reviews.author: Kim snowden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit, basic shoes which go with almost anything casual. Potentially will buy again once current are worn
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these good fit look smart , granddaughter very pleased
customer_reviews.author: mrs d k lee

customer_reviews.title: Vantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Great productt, great price, great value. Can't say any more!!
customer_reviews.author: Darren McDonnell

customer_reviews.title: Always loved The Vans old skool model
customer_reviews.text: Always loved The Vans old skool model. and this yellow is great! i wanted the spectra yellow but cant find those anywhere. This Dusky Citron is a bit more faded but also very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not really there leather model, it is more of a suede...
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought as a gift for my son and he loved them
customer_reviews.author: frances

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Quality shoes I love them, really stylish, just a wee word of caution, (although this might just be my feet). I'm usually a size 7 and I tried a pair on in shop and they felt a bit big so ordered 6.5 on here and they were spot on. Not to mention about £25 cheaper 👍 Great value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: glad I bought half a size bigger as they fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Superb stylish trainers as you would expect, glad I bought half a size bigger as they fit a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Mr M.

customer_reviews.title: Vans old skool
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for! Sizing perfect good all round skate shoe at a very good price will be ordering another pair very soon
customer_reviews.author: Kaye elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great Vans
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, going to be exchanging for a smaller size though so they fit better. But great nonetheless
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Would get these again.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son and he was so pleased with them and they fitted great.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Very comfy and look great. Sizing is good too and fits as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bex

customer_reviews.title: Now I can live my dream of being a sk8er boi
customer_reviews.text: They fit exactly as expected, are very comfortable and look just like they do in the pictures 10/8 now I can sk8
customer_reviews.author: G Webb

customer_reviews.title: Amazon deliver again, great experience.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, excellent quality shoes, no issues. Leather better option than canvas in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: GWake

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: If you like this shoes, in real life they are looks much more better, this purchase is worth it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: currently have sore heels while wearing in the shoes but other than that perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Very sore to break in, currently have sore heels while wearing in the shoes but other than that perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wore them to a festival walk around all-day in them no problem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my very fussy husband and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Really good - fast delivery and shoes are amazing and fit well. However small blemish on one side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Vans Unisex Adults’ Old Skool Classic Suede/Canvas Sneakers
product_meta.description: The Vans Old Skool, with the iconic side stripe, is a low top lace-up with re-enforced toecaps to withstand repeated wear, signature rubber waffle outsoles, and padded collars for support and flexibility.
feature_bullets: Canvas and suede upper depending on color of shoe.
Classic action stripe at the sides in a bold color.
Padded tongue and collar for comfort.
Smooth textile lining to keep feet feeling good.
